í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ë°©ë²• ````shell raspistill -o image.jpg ```` * image.jpg ì €ì¥ * gpicview image.jpg * ì‚¬ì§„ ë¯¸ë¦¬ë³´ê¸° ìŠ¤í¬ë¦°ìƒ· ````shell scrot image.jpg -b ```` í…Œì„œë ‰íŠ¸ ê²€ì¦ ````shell tesseract image.jpg - -l eng ````
````shell $ sudo wget -P /usr/share/tesseract-ocr/4.00/tessdata https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best/raw/main/kor.traineddata ```` * í•œê¸€ ë¼ì´ë¸ŒëŸ¬ë¦¬ ì¶”ê°€ * https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata_best -> ì¶”ê°€ ì–¸ì–´ ì„¤ì¹˜ ê°€ëŠ¥ ````shell tesseract image.jpg - -l eng+kor ```` * image.jpg íŒŒì¼ì—ì„œ ì˜ì–´ì™€ í•œê¸€ ë¬¸ìë¥¼ ì¶”ì¶œí•œë‹¤.
````shell $ pip install pytesseract $ pip install Pillow ```` * í…Œì„œë ‰íŠ¸ íŒŒì´ì¬ ë¼ì´ë¸ŒëŸ¬ë¦¬ ì‚¬ìš© íŒŒì´ì¬ì—ì„œ í…Œì„œë ‰íŠ¸ ì‚¬ìš©ë°©ë²• ````python import pytesseract from PIL import Image pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = "/usr/bin/tesseract" #tesseract í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ ìœ„ì¹˜ a = Image.open('image.jpg') #image.jpg íŒŒì¼ í•„ìš” result = pytesseract.image_to_string(a, lang="kor") print(result) ```` ì¹´ë©”ë¼ì™€ í…Œì„œë ‰íŠ¸ í•œë²ˆì— ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ë°©ë²• ````python import pytesseract from PIL import Image from picamera import PiCamera from time import sleep camera = PiCamera() camera.start_preview() sleep(5) camera.capture('image.jpg') camera.stop_preview() pytesseract.pytesseract.tesseract_cmd = "/usr/bin/tesseract" a = Image.open('image.jpg') result = pytesseract.image_to_string(a, lang="kor") print(result) ````

if no opencv ````shell pip3 install opencv-python sudo apt-get install libatlas-base-dev pip install -U numpy ```` python 3.9.2 pip 20.3.4 opencv-python 4.6.0.66 ls / ## Intro ## Create Keypoint keypoint_detect.py ````python import cv2 img1 =cv2.imread('../Books/OZahir.jpg',0) #ì›ë³¸ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ img2 =cv2.imread('../Books/OZh.jpg',0) #ì¸ì‹í•  ì´ë¯¸ì§€ #ì´ë¯¸ì§€ì— í‚¤í¬ì¸íŠ¸ë¥¼ ì°¾ëŠ”ë‹¤ orb = cv2.ORB_create() kp1, des1 = orb.detectAndCompute(img1,None) kp2, des2 = orb.detectAndCompute(img2,None) #desê°’ì„ í™•ì¸í•œë‹¤. print(des2.shape) print(des2[0]) #ì°¾ì€ í‚¤í¬ì¸íŠ¸ë¥¼ ì‚¬ì§„ì— ê·¸ë¦°ë‹¤ imgKp1 = cv2.drawKeypoints(img1,kp1,None) imgKp2 = cv2.drawKeypoints(img2,kp2,None) #ì´ë¯¸ì§€ì™€, í‚¤í¬ì¸íŠ¸ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ ë³´ì—¬ì¤€ë‹¤. cv2.imshow('img1',img1) cv2.imshow('kp1',imgKp1) cv2.imshow('img2',img2) cv2.imshow('kp2',imgKp2) cv2.waitKey(0) ```` ->
->
```` (500, 32) [ 85 229 81 239 18 11 47 188 54 160 74 206 247 67 153 96 54 220 28 239 75 144 157 31 248 165 47 36 45 178 1 48] ```` -> ìˆ«ì ë°°ì—´ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ í‚¤í¬ì¸íŠ¸ ê°’ì„ ì €ì¥í•œë‹¤. --- ## Find Matches ````python import cv2 img1 =cv2.imread('../Books/OZahir.jpg',0) img2 =cv2.imread('../Books/OZh.jpg',0) orb = cv2.ORB_create() kp1, des1 = orb.detectAndCompute(img1,None) kp2, des2 = orb.detectAndCompute(img2,None) bf = cv2.BFMatcher() matches = bf.knnMatch(des1,des2,k=2) good = [] for m,n in matches: Â  Â  if m.distance < 0.75*n.distance: Â  Â  Â  Â  good.append([m]) print(len(good)) img3 = cv2.drawMatchesKnn(img1,kp1,img2,kp2,good,None,flags=2) cv2.imshow('img3',img3) cv2.waitKey(0) ```` --- ## Detect with Camera ````python import cv2 import os orb = cv2.ORB_create(nfeatures=1000) #keypoints number 1000 (default = 500) ###Improting images path = '../Books' images = [] classNames = [] myList = os.listdir(path) #í´ë”ë‚´ íŒŒì¼ì„ array í˜•íƒœë¡œ ì €ì¥ [1.jpg, 2.jpg, ...] print('Total Classes Detected', len(myList)) #array ê¸¸ì´ì¶œë ¥ for cl in myList: Â  Â  imgCur = cv2.imread(f'{path}/{cl}',0) #ì´ë¯¸ì§€ íŒŒì¼ì„ cv2.imread í•¨ìˆ˜ë¡œ ì½ê¸° Â  Â  images.append(imgCur) Â  Â  classNames.append(os.path.splitext(cl)[0]) print(classNames) #ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ë°°ì—´ì„ ë°›ìœ¼ë©´ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ì˜ í‚¤í¬ì¸íŠ¸ ë°°ì—´ì„ ë°˜í™˜í•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜ def findDes (images): Â  Â  desList = [] Â  Â  for img in images: Â  Â  Â  Â  kp,des = orb.detectAndCompute(img,None) Â  Â  Â  Â  desList.append(des) Â  Â  return desList #desList(í‚¤í¬ì¸íŠ¸ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸)ì¤‘ camimgì™€ ë§¤ì¹˜ë˜ëŠ” desì˜ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤ ë²ˆí˜¸ë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜í•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜ def findID(camimg, desList, thres=20): Â  Â  camkp,camdes = orb.detectAndCompute(camimg,None) #keypoint, description ë°˜í™˜ í•¨ìˆ˜ Â  Â  bf =cv2.BFMatcher() Â  Â  matchList=[] Â  Â  finalVal = -1 Â  Â  try: Â  Â  Â  Â  for des in desList: #desListì˜ desë§ˆë‹¤ camimg ì™€ ì–¼ë§ˆë‚˜ ë§¤ì¹˜ë˜ëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸í•œë‹¤. Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  matches = bf.knnMatch(des,camdes,k=2) Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  good = [] Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  for m,n in matches: Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  if m.distance < 0.75*n.distance: Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  good.append([m]) Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  matchList.append(len(good)) Â  Â  except: Â  Â  Â  Â  pass Â  Â  if len(matchList)!=0: Â  Â  Â  Â  if max(matchList) > thres: #ì„¤ì • thresê°’ë³´ë‹¤ ë”ë§ì´ ë§¤ì¹˜ë ë•Œ Â  Â  Â  Â  finalVal = matchList.index(max(matchList)) #matchList ì¤‘ ê°€ì¥ ë§ì€ ë§¤ì¹˜ê°€ ë˜ëŠ” ë²ˆí˜¸ë¥¼ finalVal ì— ë‹´ëŠ”ë‹¤. Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  # print(matchList) Â  Â  return finalVal desList = findDes(images) print(len(desList)) cap = cv2.VideoCapture(0) #camera start while True: Â  Â  success, camimg = cap.read() Â  Â  imgOriginal = camimg.copy() Â  Â  camimg= cv2.cvtColor(camimg,cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY) Â  Â  id = findID(camimg,desList) Â  Â  if id != -1: #ë§¤ì¹˜ë˜ëŠ” ì´ë¦„ì„ ì¶œë ¥í•œë‹¤. Â  Â  Â  Â  cv2.putText(imgOriginal,classNames[id],(50,50),cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_COMPLEX, 1, (0,0,255),1) Â  Â  cv2.imshow('camimg',imgOriginal) Â  Â  cv2.waitKey(1) ```` 2d ì´ë¯¸ì§€ì—ë§Œ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ ë°©ë²•
